meanings.sent1: After the storm, they had to reequip their emergency kit with fresh supplies.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic had to reequip his toolbox with new wrenches.
meanings.sent3: She decided to reequip her backpack with snacks for the hiking trip.
meanings.sent4: The knight needed to reequip his armor before heading into battle.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut had to reequip his spacesuit before the spacewalk.

meanings.definition: To provide with new equipment or supplies
meanings.sent1: The company will reequip the office with modern computers next month.
meanings.sent2: The school decided to reequip the science lab with updated lab equipment.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to reequip the kitchen with fresh ingredients for the new menu.
meanings.sent4: The explorer needed to reequip his backpack with essentials for the expedition.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter had to reequip his gear before rushing into the burning building.
